post.summary: Add a product to the cart
post.description: This endpoint adds a product to the user's cart. If the product is already in the cart, it increases the quantity. If the stock is insufficient, it returns an error.

requestBody.description: Data for adding a product to the cart

product_id.description: ID of the product to add to the cart

quantity.description: Quantity of the product to add

items.example: The quantity field must be an integer.

get.summary: View all items in the cart
get.description: This endpoint returns all the products added to the customer's cart. If the cart is empty, a 404 response is returned.

productId.description: ID of the product in the cart

quantity.description: Quantity of the product in the cart

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all categories
get.description: This endpoint returns a list of all categories available in the system.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the category was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the category was last updated

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving the categories.

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new category or update an existing one based on the provided ID.

requestBody.description: Category data to create or update

post.description: This endpoint is used to delete a category by its ID.

id.description: ID of the category to delete

post.summary: Add a new customer or update an existing customer
post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new customer or update an existing one based on the provided customer ID.

requestBody.description: Customer data to create or update

items.example: The email must be a valid email address.

post.summary: Generate an invoice from the customer's cart
post.description: This endpoint generates an invoice for the customer based on the products in their cart. It calculates the subtotal, applies any discount, adds tax, and returns the total amount for the invoice.

requestBody.description: Invoice data to generate, including customer ID, tax rate, and optional discount

discount.description: Discount applied to the total amount (optional)

tax_rate.description: Tax rate to apply to the subtotal (in percentage)

customer_id.description: ID of the customer whose cart will be used for the invoice

total_amount.description: Total amount after discount and tax

400.description: Bad Request - Cart is empty or missing required parameters

message.example: No products in cart to generate invoice.
The customer associated with this cart could not be found.
An unexpected error occurred while generating the invoice.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of all products
get.description: This endpoint returns a list of all products available in the system.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the product was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the product was last updated

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while retrieving the products.

post.summary: Add a new product or update an existing product
post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new product or update an existing product based on the provided product ID.

requestBody.description: Product data to create or update

message.example: Validation failed for the provided product data.
Internal server error occurred while saving the product.

get.description: Retrieve a product's details by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the product to retrieve

message.example: No product found with the given ID.

post.description: Delete a product based on the provided ID.

requestBody.description: The ID of the product to delete

message.example: No product found with the given ID.
